summary: Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery and absence of a rider for the customer's order.  Identified Problem: The customer’s order was not delivered as expected due to a technical issue on the company's end, resulting in no rider being assigned.  Contributing Factors: - Technical issues within the order processing system. - Lack of timely communication regarding the status of the order.  Customer sentiment: The customer expressed frustration due to the delay but remained polite and cooperative throughout the conversation.  Resolution Offered: The agent issued a refund to the customer's ZUS balance and informed them that they would need to place a new order due to the technical issue.  Potential Relevant Departments/Persons: - Technical Support Team (to investigate and resolve the technical issues) - Customer Service Management (to review the handling of the situation and improve communication protocols)

summary: Primary Concern: Delay in order delivery due to unavailability of a rider.  Identified Problem: The customer’s order was not delivered within the expected timeframe because no rider was assigned to pick up the order.  Contributing Factors: - The customer experienced a waiting time exceeding 30 minutes without any updates on the order status. - The agent repeatedly failed to recognize the correct order ID provided by the customer, leading to frustration.  Customer sentiment: The customer expressed frustration and anger throughout the conversation, particularly due to the long wait time and the agent's inability to assist effectively.  Resolution Offered: The agent processed a refund to the customer's ZUS Balance and assured that the issue would be highlighted to the relevant department for further action.  Potential Relevant Departments/Persons: - Customer Service Department - Logistics/Rider Management Team

Identified Problem: The order was not prepared in a timely manner due to the absence of an assigned rider.  Contributing Factors: - Lack of rider availability, causing delays in order preparation. - Customer's repeated attempts to get assistance and frustration over the long wait time.
